remarks: The composition of two polynomials is a polynomial.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
plyco.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plyco.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plyco.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) $.
plyco.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) $.
plyco $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
